author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
In kingdom's coffers, oil's ascent in sway,
On inflation hopes, and lack of supply's play,
In the west, a boon does this convey,
The third week's gain, to our delight, holds sway.

Once humble, now a victor in the Golf War fray,
A million coins Scheffler does weigh,
From the tourney's gain, a king for a day,
Thank Saudi's feud, for this lucrative play.

The golden hue, its fall does stay,
In the morrow, fiends of loss shan't lay,
From interest's peak, and dollar's decay,
The yellow pledge, in fortune's way, will lay.

feedItems.title: Oil Set for Weekly Gains on Inflation Hopes, Supply Issues
feedItems.description: Oil prices declined in Europe, but were set for their third weekly gain, as positive economic signals in the U.S. and supply challenges lifted prices.

feedItems.title: He Makes $1 Million a Golf Tournament. He Can Thank the Golf War.
feedItems.description: Scottie Scheffler has won handsomely from the PGA Tour’s battle with Saudi Arabia.

feedItems.title: Gold Likely to Find Support in the Medium Term
feedItems.description: Gold prices are likely to find support in the medium term, with a peaking of interest rates and a softening of the dollar to act as a tailwind for the yellow metal, according to ANZ.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
O Burberry, thou art like a jug of ale
That hath fermented well, thine sales accrued
In line with hopes, and yet thou dost not fail,
To hold thy venture's course, full-year viewed.

The Swedish krona, akin to grape so sour,
Did suffer losses sharp and felt affray,
But like strong wine, hath gained in recent hour,
A fleeting gleam of hope, says good SEB.

Just as the tavern close, ere drunkards part,
Nikkei did slip, by auto, stocks retail,
Like spilt mead causeth sorrow to the heart,
Thus Fed's fall and USD/JPY travail.

feedItems.title: Burberry Backs Full-Year Views
feedItems.description: Burberry reiterated its full-year and mid-term guidance after posting an 18% rise in first-quarter sales, in line with expectations.

feedItems.title: Swedish Krona Resurfaces After Recent Sharp Losses
feedItems.description: The Swedish krona’s strong appreciation in recent days is the clearest attempt at a turnaround since March this year, SEB said.

feedItems.title: Nikkei Slips 0.1%, Dragged by Auto, Retail Stocks
feedItems.description: Japanese stocks ended slightly lower, dragged by falls in auto and retail stocks, amid lessened prospects for further Fed tightening and USD/JPY declines.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Hear now the woeful tale of the German Yield, 
Struggling 'bove two-and-a-half, its destiny sealed.
In the absence of challenge from ECB rate,
It cannot above this threshold elevate.

Once mightful Nokia, used to countless victories,
Now forecast a drop in its annual treasuries.
With weakened demand for infrastructure and Lore,
Its profit margins are not what they were before.

But behold Ericsson, bearing losses slight,
Through a storm of torment, it revels in light. 
With restructuring tempests weighing heavy and cruel,
Yet it rides into the future, serene and cool.

feedItems.title: Ten-Year German Bund Yields Seen Struggling Above 2.50%
feedItems.description: If a significant challenge to the ECB terminal deposit rate pricing of 4% is absent, it will be difficult for 10-year Bund yields to remain above 2.5%, Barclays said.

feedItems.title: Nokia Cuts Sales Outlook, Narrows Margin Guidance
feedItems.description: Nokia now sees full-year sales of between €23.2-€24.6 billion and lowered its operating margin outlook on weaker demand in its network infrastructure and mobile networks businesses.

feedItems.title: Ericsson Posts Smaller-Than-Expected Loss
feedItems.description: Ericsson reported a second-quarter loss of SEK686 million, as sales rose 3%, with earnings weighed down by restructuring charges, and said trends and market mix will likely be similar in the third quarter.

author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
From Eastern lands, where the dragon lies unbroken,
Comes Cathay's phoenix, by renaissance outspoken.
Once touched by plague, now set for affluent half,
On destiny's canvas, our longings draft.

In the House of the Free, where debate grips the heart,
Fear threatens peace, tearing unity apart.
Amendments are poison, on defense bill encroached,
A bitter pill swallowed, as discord is broached. 

In the realm of the fragrant harbour's dread,
The dragon's breath doth strike such potent dread.
Overseas, it reaches, with bounty and laws,
Searching for dissenters, in its gaping maws.

feedItems.title: Cathay Pacific Guides for First-Half Profit Amid Reopening
feedItems.description: Cathay Pacific Airways expects to swing to a profit in the first half of the year, as a rebound in travel demand after China’s reopening helped the carrier recover from tough pandemic years.

feedItems.title: House GOP Threatens to Derail Defense Bill Over Abortion, Transgender Care
feedItems.description: Democrats have warned that divisive social-issue amendments would be poison pills.

feedItems.title: Hong Kong Takes Its Crackdown Abroad
feedItems.description: Authorities are questioning families and placing hefty bounties on overseas activists sought under violations of the national security law.
